Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1715.text: And the children of Joseph said, “The hill is not enough for us; and all the Canaanites who dwell in the land of the valley have chariots of iron, both those who are of Bethshean and her towns, and those who are of the Valley of Jezreel.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1716.text: And Joshua spoke unto the house of Joseph, even to Ephraim and to Manasseh, saying, “Thou art a great people and hast great power. Thou shalt not have one lot only;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1717.text: but the mountain shall be thine, for it is a wood and thou shalt cut it down. And the boundaries of it shall be thine; for thou shalt drive out the Canaanites, though they have iron chariots and though they be strong.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S180.text: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S181.text: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S182.text: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, “How long are ye slack to go to possess the land which the Lord God of your fathers hath given you?

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S183.text: Appoint from among you three men for each tribe, and I will send them; and they shall rise and go through the land, and describe it according to the inheritance of them; and they shall come again to me.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S184.text: And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their border on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their borders on the north.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S185.text: Ye shall therefore describe the land into seven parts and bring the description hither to me, that I may cast lots for you here before the Lord our God.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S186.text: But the Levites have no part among you, for the priesthood of the Lord is their inheritance. And Gad and Reuben and half the tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance beyond the Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of the Lord gave them.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S187.text: And the men arose and went away; and Joshua charged those who went to describe the land, saying, “Go, and walk through the land and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the Lord in Shiloh.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S188.text: And the men went and passed through the land and described it by cities into seven parts in a book, and came again to Joshua to the host at Shiloh.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S189.text: And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the Lord, and there Joshua divided the land unto the children of Israel according to their divisions.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1810.text: And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families; and the borders of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1811.text: And their border on the north side was from the Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the boundaries thereof were at the Wilderness of Bethaven.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1812.text: And the border went over from thence toward Luz, to the side of Luz (which is Bethel), southward; and the border descended to Atarothadar, near the hill that lieth on the south side of the Nether Bethhoron.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1813.text: And the border was drawn thence and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that lieth before Bethhoron southward; and the boundaries thereof were at Kirjathbaal, which is Kirjathjearim, a city of the children of Judah: this was the west quarter.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1814.text: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjathjearim, and the border went out on the west and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1815.text: And the border came down to the end of the mountain that lieth before the Valley of the Son of Hinnom and which is in the Valley of the Giants on the north, and descended to the Valley of Hinnom, to the side of the Jebusites on the south, and descended to Enrogel;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1816.text: and was drawn from the north, and went forth to Enshemesh, and went forth toward Geliloth, which is over against the ascent of Adummim, and descended to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1817.text: and passed along toward the side over against Arabah northward, and went down unto Arabah.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1818.text: And the border passed along to the side of Bethhoglah northward; and the boundaries of the border were at the north bay of the Salt Sea at the south end of the Jordan: this was the south border.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1819.text: And the Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin by the borders thereof round about, according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1820.text: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Bethhoglah, and the Valley of Keziz,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1821.text: and Betharabah, and Zemaraim, and Bethel,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1822.text: and Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1823.text: and Chepharhaammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba: twelve cities with their villages;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1825.text: and Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1826.text: and Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1827.text: and Zelah, Eleph, and Jebus (which is Jerusalem), Gibeath, and Kirjath: fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S190.text: And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families; and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S191.text: And they had in their inheritance Beersheba (or Sheba), and Moladah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S192.text: and Hazarshual, and Balah, and Ezem,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S193.text: and Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S194.text: and Ziklag, and Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S195.text: and Bethlebaoth, and Sharuhen: thirteen cities and their villages;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S196.text: Ain, Rimmon, and Ether, and Ashan: four cities and their villages;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S197.text: and all the villages that were round about these cities to Baalathbeer, Ramah of the South. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S198.text: Out of the portion of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon, for the part of the children of Judah was too much for them. Therefore the children of Simeon had their inheritance within the inheritance of them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S199.text: And the third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families, and the border of their inheritance was unto Sarid.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1910.text: And their border went up toward the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that is before Jokneam,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1911.text: and turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrising unto the border of Chislothtabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1912.text: and from thence passeth on along on the east to Gittahhepher, to Ittahkazin, and goeth out to Rimmon to Neah.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1913.text: And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon, and the boundaries thereof are in the Valley of Jiphthahel,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1914.text: and Kattath, and Nahallal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Bethlehem: twelve cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1915.text: This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1916.text: And the fourth lot came out to Issachar, for the children of Issachar according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1917.text: And their border was toward Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1918.text: and Hapharaim, and Shion, and Anaharath,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1919.text: and Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1920.text: and Remeth, and Engannim, and Enhaddah, and Bethpazzez.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1921.text: And the border reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Bethshemesh, and the boundaries of their border were at the Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1922.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1923.text: And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1924.text: And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1925.text: and Alammelech, and Amad, and Mishal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihorlibnath;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1926.text: and turneth toward the sunrising to Bethdagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the Valley of Jiphthahel toward the north side of Bethemek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1927.text: and Ebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah, even unto Great Sidon.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1928.text: And then the border turneth to Ramah, and to the stronghold city of Tyre; and the border turneth to Hosah, and the boundaries thereof are at the sea from the border to Achzib;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1929.text: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1930.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families, these cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1931.text: The sixth lot came out to the children of Naphtali, even for the children of Naphtali according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1932.text: And their border was from Heleph, from Allon to Zaanannim, and Adami, Nekeb, and Jabneel, unto Lakkum; and the boundaries thereof were at the Jordan.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1933.text: And then the border turneth westward to Aznothtabor, and goeth out from thence to Hukkok, and reacheth to Zebulun on the south side, and reacheth to Asher on the west side, and to Judah upon the Jordan toward the sunrising.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1934.text: And the fortified cities are Ziddim, Zer, and Hammath, Rakkath, and Chinnereth,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1935.text: and Adamah, and Ramah, and Hazor,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1936.text: and Kedesh, and Edrei, and Enhazor,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1937.text: and Iron, and Migdalel, Horem, and Bethanath, and Bethshemesh: nineteen cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1938.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Naphtali according to their families, the cities and their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1939.text: And the seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1940.text: And the border of their inheritance was Zorah, and Eshtaol, and Irshemesh,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1941.text: and Shaalabbin, and Aijalon, and Jethlah,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1942.text: And Elon, and Timnah, and Ekron,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1943.text: and Eltekeh, and Gibbethon, and Baalath,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1944.text: and Jehud, and Beneberak, and Gathrimmon,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1945.text: and Mejarkon, and Rakkon, with the border before Joppa.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1946.text: And the border of the children of Dan went out too little for them. Therefore the children of Dan went up to fight against Leshem, and took it and smote it with the edge of the sword, and possessed it and dwelt therein, and called Leshem, Dan, after the name of Dan their father.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1947.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families, these cities with their villages.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1948.text: When they had made an end of dividing the land for inheritance by their borders, the children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun among them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1949.text: According to the word of the Lord they gave him the city which he asked, even Timnathserah in Mount Ephraim; and he built the city and dwelt therein.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S1950.text: These are the inheritances which Eleazar the priest and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel divided for an inheritance by lot in Shiloh before the Lord, at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation. So they made an end of dividing the country.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S200.text: The Lord also spoke unto Joshua, saying,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S201.text: “Speak to the children of Israel, saying, ‘Appoint out for you cities of refuge, whereof I spoke unto you by the hand of Moses,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S202.text: that the slayer who killeth any person unawares and unwittingly may flee thither; and they shall be your refuge from the avenger of blood.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S203.text: And when he that doth flee unto one of those cities shall stand at the entrance of the gate of the city and shall declare his cause in the ears of the elders of that city, they shall take him into the city unto them and give him a place, that he may dwell among them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S204.text: And if the avenger of blood pursue after him, then they shall not deliver the slayer up into his hand, because he smote his neighbor unwittingly and hated him not beforehand.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S205.text: And he shall dwell in that city until he stand before the congregation for judgment, and until the death of the high priest who shall be in those days. Then shall the slayer return and come unto his own city and unto his own house, unto the city from whence he fled.’”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S206.text: And they appointed Kedesh in Galilee in Mount Naphtali, and Shechem in Mount Ephraim, and Kirjatharba (which is Hebron) in the mountain of Judah.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S207.text: And on the other side of the Jordan by Jericho eastward, they assigned Bezer in the wilderness upon the plain from the tribe of Reuben, and Ramoth in Gilead from the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan from the tribe of Manasseh.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S208.text: These were the cities appointed for all the children of Israel and for the stranger who sojourneth among them, that whosoever killeth any person unawares might flee thither, and not die by the hand of the avenger of blood until he stood before the congregation.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2110.text: And they gave them the city of Arba (the father of Anak), which city is Hebron, in the hill country of Judah, with the suburbs thereof round about it.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2111.text: But the fields of the city and the villages thereof gave they to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2112.text: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron, the priest, Hebron with her suburbs to be a city of refuge for the slayer, and Libnah with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2113.text: and Jattir with her suburbs, and Eshtemoa with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2114.text: and Holon with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2115.text: and Ain with her suburbs, and Juttah with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs: nine cities from those two tribes.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2116.text: And from the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with her suburbs, Geba with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2117.text: Anathoth with her suburbs, and Almon with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2118.text: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2119.text: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites who remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot from the tribe of Ephraim.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2120.text: For they gave them Shechem with her suburbs in Mount Ephraim to be a city of refuge for the slayer, and Gezer with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2121.text: and Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2122.text: And from the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with her suburbs, Gibbethon with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2123.text: Aijalon with her suburbs, Gathrimmon with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2124.text: And from the halftribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs: two cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2125.text: All the cities were ten with their suburbs for the families of the children of Kohath who remained.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2126.text: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, from the other halftribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Beeshterah with her suburbs: two cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2127.text: And from the tribe of Issachar, Kishion with her suburbs, Daberath with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2128.text: Jarmuth with her suburbs, Engannim with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2129.text: And from the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2130.text: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2131.text: And from the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs to be a city of refuge for the slayer, and Hammothdor with her suburbs, and Kartan with her suburbs: three cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2132.text: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2133.text: And unto the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, from the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with her suburbs, and Kartah with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2134.text: Dimnah with her suburbs, Nahalal with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2135.text: And from the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with her suburbs, and Jahazah with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2136.text: Kedemoth with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs: four cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2137.text: And from the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs to be a city of refuge for the slayer, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2138.text: Heshbon with her suburbs, Jazer with her suburbs: four cities in all.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2139.text: So all the cities for the children of Merari by their families, who were remaining of the families of the Levites, were by their lot twelve cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2140.text: All the cities of the Levites within the possession of the children of Israel were forty and eight cities with their suburbs.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2141.text: These cities were every one with their suburbs round about them; thus were all these cities.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2142.text: And the Lord gave unto Israel all the land which He swore to give unto their fathers; and they possessed it and dwelt therein.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2143.text: And the Lord gave them rest round about, according to all that He swore unto their fathers. And there stood not a man of all their enemies before them; the Lord delivered all their enemies into their hand.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2144.text: There failed not aught of any good thing which the Lord had spoken unto the house of Israel. All came to pass.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S224.text: But take diligent heed to do the commandment and the law which Moses the servant of the Lord charged you: to love the Lord your God, and to walk in all His ways, and to keep His commandments, and to cleave unto Him, and to serve Him with all your heart and with all your soul.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S225.text: So Joshua blessed them and sent them away, and they went unto their tents.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S226.text: Now to one half of the tribe of Manasseh Moses had given a possession in Bashan, but unto the other half thereof gave Joshua among their brethren on this side of the Jordan westward. And when Joshua sent them away also unto their tents, then he blessed them

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S227.text: and he spoke unto them, saying, “Return with much riches unto your tents, and with very much cattle, with silver, and with gold, and with brass, and with iron, and with very much raiment. Divide the spoil of your enemies with your brethren.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S228.text: And the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the halftribe of Manasseh returned, and departed from the children of Israel out of Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan, to go unto the country of Gilead to the land of their possession, which they possessed according to the word of the Lord by the hand of Moses.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S229.text: And when they came unto the borders of the Jordan that are in the land of Canaan, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the halftribe of Manasseh built there an altar by the Jordan, a great altar to see to.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2210.text: And the children of Israel heard say: “Behold, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the halftribe of Manasseh have built an altar over against the land of Canaan in the borders of the Jordan, at the passage of the children of Israel.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2211.text: And when the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh to go up to war against them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2212.text: And the children of Israel sent unto the children of Reuben and to the children of Gad and to the halftribe of Manasseh into the land of Gilead, Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2213.text: and with him ten princes, of each chief house a prince throughout all the tribes of Israel; and each one was a head of the house of their fathers among the thousands of Israel.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2214.text: And they came unto the children of Reuben and to the children of Gad and to the halftribe of Manasseh, unto the land of Gilead, and they spoke with them, saying,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2215.text: “Thus saith the whole congregation of the Lord: ‘What trespass is this that ye have committed against the God of Israel to turn away this day from following the Lord, in that ye have built yourselves an altar, that ye might rebel this day against the Lord?

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2216.text: Is the iniquity of Peor too little for us, from which we are not cleansed until this day, although there was a plague in the congregation of the Lord,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2217.text: but that ye must turn away this day from following the Lord? And it will be, seeing ye rebel today against the Lord, that tomorrow He will be wroth with the whole congregation of Israel.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2218.text: Notwithstanding, if the land of your possession be unclean, then pass ye over unto the land of the possession of the Lord wherein the Lord’S tabernacle dwelleth, and take possession among us; but rebel not against the Lord, nor rebel against us in building yourselves an altar besides the altar of the Lord our God.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2219.text: Did not Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the accursed thing, and wrath fell on all the congregation of Israel? And that man perished not alone in his iniquity.’”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2220.text: Then the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the halftribe of Manasseh answered and said unto the heads of the thousands of Israel,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2221.text: “The Lord God of gods, the Lord God of gods, He knoweth, and Israel he shall know! If it be in rebellion or if in transgression against the Lord (save us not this day)

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2222.text: that we have built us an altar to turn from following the Lord, or if to offer thereon burnt offering or meat offering, or if to offer peace offerings thereon, let the Lord Himself require it.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2223.text: And if we have not rather done it for fear of this thing, saying, ‘In time to come your children might speak unto our children, saying, “What have ye to do with the Lord God of Israel?

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2224.text: For the Lord hath made the Jordan a border between us and you, ye children of Reuben and children of Gad. Ye have no part in the Lord.” So shall your children make our children cease from fearing the Lord.’

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2225.text: Therefore we said, ‘Let us now prepare to build us an altar, not for burnt offering nor for sacrifice,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2226.text: but that it may be a witness between us and you and our generations after us, that we might do the service of the Lord before Him with our burnt offerings and with our sacrifices and with our peace offerings, that your children may not say to our children in time to come, “Ye have no part in the Lord.”’

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2227.text: Therefore we said that it shall be, when they should so say to us or to our generations in time to come, that we may say again, ‘Behold the pattern of the altar of the Lord which our fathers made, not for burnt offerings nor for sacrifices, but it is a witness between us and you.’

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2228.text: God forbid that we should rebel against the Lord and turn this day from following the Lord to build an altar for burnt offerings, for meat offerings, or for sacrifices, besides the altar of the Lord our God that is before His tabernacle.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2229.text: And when Phinehas the priest and the princes of the congregation and heads of the thousands of Israel who were with him heard the words that the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the children of Manasseh spoke, it pleased them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2230.text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said unto the children of Reuben and to the children of Gad and to the children of Manasseh: “This day we perceive that the Lord is among us, because ye have not committed this trespass against the Lord. Now ye have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of the Lord.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2231.text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, and the princes, returned from the children of Reuben and from the children of Gad out of the land of Gilead unto the land of Canaan to the children of Israel, and brought them word again.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2232.text: And the thing pleased the children of Israel; and the children of Israel blessed God, and did not intend to go up against them in battle to destroy the land wherein the children of Reuben and Gad dwelt.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2233.text: And the children of Reuben and the children of Gad called the altar Ed [that is, A witness], “For it shall be a witness between us that the Lord is God.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S230.text: And it came to pass, a long time after the Lord had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old and stricken in age.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S231.text: And Joshua called for all Israel, and for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said unto them, “I am old and stricken in age.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S232.text: And ye have seen all that the Lord your God hath done unto all these nations because of you, for the Lord your God is He that hath fought for you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S233.text: Behold, I have divided unto you by lot these nations that remain to be an inheritance for your tribes, from the Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even unto the Great Sea westward.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S234.text: And the Lord your God, He shall expel them from before you and drive them from out of your sight; and ye shall possess their land, as the Lord your God hath promised unto you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S235.text: Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the Book of the Law of Moses, that ye turn not aside therefrom to the right hand or to the left;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S236.text: that ye come not among these nations, these that remain among you, neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause any to swear by them, neither serve them nor bow yourselves unto them.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S237.text: But cleave unto the Lord your God, as ye have done unto this day.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S238.text: For the Lord hath driven out from before you great nations and strong; but as for you, no man hath been able to stand before you unto this day.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S239.text: One man of you shall chase a thousand; for the Lord your God, He it is that fighteth for you, as He hath promised you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2310.text: Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye love the Lord your God.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2311.text: Or else, if ye do in any wise go back and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them and go in unto them and they to you,

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2312.text: know for a certainty that the Lord your God will no more drive out any of these nations from before you, but they shall be snares and traps unto you and scourges in your sides and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land which the Lord your God hath given you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2313.text: “And behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth. And ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the Lord your God spoke concerning you: all have come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2314.text: Therefore it shall come to pass that, as all good things have come upon you which the Lord your God promised you, so shall the Lord bring upon you all evil things until He have destroyed you from off this good land which the Lord your God hath given you:

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2315.text: when ye have transgressed the covenant of the Lord your God which He commanded you, and have gone and served other gods and bowed yourselves to them, then shall the anger of the Lord be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which He hath given unto you.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S240.text: And Joshua gathered all the tribes of Israel to Shechem, and called for the elders of Israel and for their heads and for their judges and for their officers; and they presented themselves before God.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S241.text: And Joshua said unto all the people, “Thus saith the Lord God of Israel: ‘Your fathers dwelt on the other side of the river in old time, even Terah, the father of Abraham and the father of Nahor; and they served other gods.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S242.text: And I took your father Abraham from the other side of the river and led him throughout all the land of Canaan, and multiplied his seed and gave him Isaac.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S243.text: And I gave unto Isaac Jacob and Esau; and I gave unto Esau Mount Seir to possess it, but Jacob and his children went down into Egypt.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S244.text: I sent Moses also and Aaron, and I plagued Egypt, according to that which I did among them; and afterward I brought you out.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S245.text: And I brought your fathers out of Egypt; and ye came unto the sea, and the Egyptians pursued after your fathers with chariots and horsemen unto the Red Sea.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S246.text: And when they cried unto the Lord, He put darkness between you and the Egyptians, and brought the sea upon them and covered them. And your eyes have seen what I have done in Egypt; and ye dwelt in the wilderness a long season.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S247.text: And I brought you into the land of the Amorites, who dwelt on the other side of the Jordan. And they fought with you; and I gave them into your hand, that ye might possess their land, and I destroyed them from before you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S248.text: Then Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, arose and warred against Israel, and sent and called Balaam the son of Beor to curse you.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S249.text: But I would not hearken unto Balaam. Therefore he blessed you still; so I delivered you out of his hand.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2410.text: And ye went over the Jordan and came unto Jericho; and the men of Jericho fought against you — the Amorites, and the Perizzites, and the Canaanites, and the Hittites, and the Girgashites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites. And I delivered them into your hand.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2411.text: And I sent the hornet before you which drove them out from before you, even the two kings of the Amorites, but not with thy sword nor with thy bow.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2412.text: And I have given you a land for which ye did not labor and cities which ye built not, and ye dwell in them. Of the vineyards and oliveyards which ye planted not do ye eat.’

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2413.text: “Now therefore, fear the Lord, and serve Him in sincerity and in truth; and put away the gods which your fathers served on the other side of the river and in Egypt, and serve ye the Lord.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2414.text: And if it seem evil unto you to serve the Lord, choose you this day whom ye will serve, whether the gods which your fathers served that were on the other side of the river, or the gods of the Amorites in whose land ye dwell. But as for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2415.text: And the people answered and said, “God forbid that we should forsake the Lord to serve other gods;

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2416.text: for the Lord our God, He it is that brought us up and our fathers out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage, and who did those great signs in our sight, and preserved us in all the way wherein we went and among all the people through whom we passed.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2417.text: And the Lord drove out from before us all the people, even the Amorites who dwelt in the land. Therefore will we also serve the Lord, for He is our God.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2418.text: And Joshua said unto the people, “Ye cannot serve the Lord, for He is a holy God; He is a jealous God; He will not forgive your transgressions nor your sins:

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2419.text: if ye forsake the Lord and serve strange gods, then He will turn and do you hurt, and consume you after He hath done you good.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2420.text: And the people said unto Joshua, “Nay; but we will serve the Lord.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2421.text: And Joshua said unto the people, “Ye are witnesses against yourselves that ye have chosen for yourselves the Lord to serve Him.” And they said, “We are witnesses.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2422.text: “Now therefore put away,” said he, “the strange gods which are among you, and incline your heart unto the Lord God of Israel.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2423.text: And the people said unto Joshua, “The Lord our God will we serve, and His voice will we obey.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2424.text: So Joshua made a covenant with the people that day, and set them a statute and an ordinance in Shechem.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2425.text: And Joshua wrote these words in the Book of the Law of God, and took a great stone and set it up there under an oak that was by the sanctuary of the Lord.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2426.text: And Joshua said unto all the people, “Behold, this stone shall be a witness unto us, for it hath heard all the words of the Lord which He spoke unto us. It shall be therefore a witness unto you, lest ye deny your God.”

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2427.text: So Joshua let the people depart, every man unto his inheritance.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2428.text: And it came to pass after these things that Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the Lord, died, being a hundred and ten years old.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2429.text: And they buried him in the border of his inheritance in Timnathserah, which is in Mount Ephraim, on the north side of the Hill of Gaash.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2430.text: And Israel served the Lord all the days of Joshua, and all the days of the elders who outlived Joshua and who had known all the works of the Lord, that He had done for Israel.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2431.text: And the bones of Joseph, which the children of Israel brought up out of Egypt, buried they in Shechem, in a parcel of ground which Jacob bought from the sons of Hamor the father of Shechem for a hundred pieces of silver. And it became the inheritance of the children of Joseph.

Joshua2coOAF2dByWwsL1S2432.text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron died; and they buried him in a hill that pertained to Phinehas his son, which was given him in Mount Ephraim.
